name: Not Desert Bus
description:
Not Desert Bus was created for the Desert Bus for Hope 10 Jam!

Find your way from Tucson, Arizona to Las Vegas, Nevada.

On foot.

Controls:

Movement: WASD or ZQSD

Camera: MOUSE or ARROWKEYS

  • All the games I've made
